thread.title: TV | Bridget Jones's Diary

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Bridget Jones's Diary
text: What with a new Bridget Jones's Diary movie currently being filmed in London, we may as well look back at the original movie for the 300th time. For those that somehow may never have seen this, it follows the story of single woman Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) who begins a new year with resolutions to find love, quit her bad habits and take a step up the career ladder. Her plans crumble as she tries to deal with her mother's infidelity, get over a passionate fling with her boss and come to terms with her feelings for an uptight lawyer, who may just end up loving her 'just as she is'. Sniff...
